properties.entry: SELECT LOD_NO,LOD_NAME,LOD_ADDRESS,FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME THUMBNAIL FROM LODGING L JOIN PHOTO P USING (LOD_NO) JOIN LOD_CATEGORY LC USING(LOD_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE LOD_CATEGORY_NAME = ? AND L.STATUS ='Y' AND P.FILE_LEVEL=1

SELECT LOD_NO,LOD_NAME,LOD_ADDRESS,LOD_INFO,LOD_CATEGORY_NAME,FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME THUMBNAIL FROM LODGING L JOIN PHOTO P USING (LOD_NO) LEFT JOIN LODGING_DETAIL LD USING(LOD_NO) JOIN LOD_CATEGORY LC USING(LOD_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE LOD_NO=? AND P.FILE_LEVEL=1
SELECT REVIEW_NO,REVIEW_CONTENT,USER_NAME,CREATE_DATE,ROOM_NAME,COUNT FROM REVIEW R JOIN LODGING_DETAIL LD USING(ROOM_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M USING(USER_NO) WHERE R.STATUS='Y' AND LOD_NO=?
